alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 8:22AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dubuque and northeastern Delaware Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 822 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Earlville, or 8 miles east of Manchester, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dyersville, New Vienna and Colesburg around 830 AM CDT. Luxemburg around 835 AM CDT. Holy Cross around 840 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rickardsville and Balltown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
